trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Klamath Falls
There were no other sightings in Klamath Falls on or around December 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my buddy were chillin in his back yard smokin a blunt watchin the airplains land and take off from kingsly field (our local air base) when i noticed a slinder disc shaped object with red blinking lights just hovering in place about a mile from the base. i watched it for a moment thinking it was just a plain but it wasnt moving. it just lurked there for a bout thirty seconds after then it started to slowly move forward and then after a couple seconds it just took off with amazing speed out of sight. me and my buddy were in aww!! we bolth new what we just saw
Summary: disc shaped craft with red lights hovering close to our air base
